title: Rita Simons tells I'm A Celeb contestants to 'smuggle' banned items in
text:

Another series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! is just around the corner, and another pack of nervous stars gets ready to head into the jungle.

Rita Simons has now given her advice to this year's camp mates - and she's urged them all to break the rules.

The former EastEnders actress, 42, admitted she smuggled lots of banned items in and "got caught with everything".

Speaking to Mirror Online at the Pride of Britain Awards 2019, Rita said: "My advice would be smuggle, smuggle it in. What are you gonna lose? Are you gonna get chucked out? I got caught with everything.

"When I say be prepared to be hungry I'm not joking. Be prepared to be more hungry than you've ever been in your life."

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

Rita is currently starring in Everybody's Talking About Jamie in the West End and says she's too busy to watch the show live.

She added: "I've been on the stage three years solid so I don't watch any TV, I don't get to see anything.

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

(Image: PA)

"I'm gonna have to go on catch up and watch it because I'm desperate to see who's going in. I think I know a few people.

"One of my friends has told me they're not doing it so I'm like, 'Are you lying to me?' So I need to watch it and find out."
description: EXCLUSIVE: Rita Simons starred in last year's series of I'm A Celeb, and she revealed her advice to this year's camp mates at the Pride of Britain Awards
